plentry.pd: Additional information, maximum length is 1024 bytes. The SDK uploads this information along with the screenshot to the Agora server; after the screenshot is complete, the Agora server sends the additional information to your server along with the callback notification.

Function modules. See . You can configure up to 32 instances. The value range of MAX_CONTENT_INSPECT_MODULE_COUNT is an integer in [1,32]. Only one instance can be configured per function module. Currently, only screenshot upload is supported.
Number of function modules, i.e., the number of configured instances. Must match the number of instances configured in modules. Maximum value is 32.

Additional information, with a maximum length of 1024 bytes. The SDK uploads this information along with the screenshot to the Agora server. After the screenshot is complete, the Agora server sends the additional information back to your server in the callback notification.

(Optional) Server configuration for video moderation services on the cloud marketplace. This parameter only takes effect when the type in is set to ContentInspectImageModeration. To use this feature, please [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/).

Function modules. See . Up to 32 instances are supported. The value range of MAX_CONTENT_INSPECT_MODULE_COUNT is an integer in [1,32]. Only one instance can be configured per function module. Currently, only screenshot upload is supported.
Number of function modules, i.e., the number of instances configured. Must match the number of instances in modules. Maximum value is 32.

Additional information, with a maximum length of 1024 bytes. The SDK uploads the additional information along with the screenshot to the Agora server; after the screenshot is completed, the Agora server sends the additional information to your server along with the callback notification.

(Optional) Server configuration related to video moderation in the Cloud Marketplace. This parameter takes effect only when the type in is set to contentInspectImageModeration. To use this feature, please [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/).

Function modules. See . Supports up to 32 instances. The value range for MAX_CONTENT_INSPECT_MODULE_COUNT is an integer between [1, 32]. Only one instance can be configured for each function module. Currently, only screenshot upload is supported.
The number of function modules, i.e., the number of configured instances. Must match the number of instances configured in modules. Maximum value is 32.

Additional information, with a maximum length of 1024 bytes. The SDK uploads the additional information along with the screenshot to the Agora server. After the screenshot is completed, the Agora server sends the additional information to your server along with the callback notification.

(Optional) Cloud Marketplace video moderation related server configuration. This parameter takes effect only when the type in is set to CONTENT_INSPECT_IMAGE_MODERATION. To use this feature, [contact technical support](https://ticket.shengwang.cn/).

Functional modules. See . Supports up to 32 instances. The value range for MAX_CONTENT_INSPECT_MODULE_COUNT is an integer between [1, 32]. Only one instance can be configured for each functional module. Currently, only screenshot upload is supported.
Number of functional modules, i.e., the number of configured instances. Must match the number of instances configured in modules. Maximum value is 32.
